greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Position of the first n-digit prime in the decimal expansion of e=exp(1).
comment: a(10)=99 leads to the 10-digit prime 7427466391 which is the answer to the so-called "google puzzle" (January 2006).
results.author: Pascal Molin (colin.lampas(AT)laposte.net), Feb 23 2006
